name: Nite Ize Loopable Gear Tie
description: This version of Nite Ize’s Ultimate Twist Tie has a loop on one end for fast cinching, hanging, or even to keep track of the Gear Tie (think threading the cable through the loop).Made of tough rubber-coated wire.Integrated loop adds versatility to both retention and storage options.46cm (18 in.) long.Sold in pack of 2.
